# 思科网络实验室 CCNA 实验指南（梁广民）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin
sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin
sike-wangluo-shiyanshi-ccna-shiyan-zhinan-liangguangmin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
